content: हिंस्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [हिंस्-र] {@--1@} Injurious, noxious, mischievous, hurtful, murderous; <ls>Ms. 9. 80</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 56.</ls> {@--2@} Terrible. {@--3@} Cruel, fierce, savage. --स्रः {@--1@} A fierce animal, beast of prey; <ls>R. 2. 27</ls> {@--2@} A destroyer. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Bhīma.
